evidence.claim: Software Testing Solutions LLC implements HIPAA compliance in their health tech solutions.
The company uses X12 transaction sets for EDI processes relevant to healthcare data exchange.
Their healthcare data services include support for FHIR standards to ensure interoperability.
STS Healthcare focuses on secure data integration patterns for healthcare providers.

icp.icp_reason: Focus on HIPAA, X12, and EDI positions them as a potential ICP for healthcare data exchange.
